toasts.reasonRequiredDesc: Tosɛngi bino bópesa ntina ya koboya.
toasts.postReturnedDesc: Poste ezongisami na mokeli na makanisi na yo.

documentation.title: Lisalisi & Mikanda
documentation.subtitle: Luka ba guides mpe ba ressources mpo na kosalisa yo ozwa matomba mingi na Contentry. Pona motambwisi na kotalela mokumba na yo.

whatsNew.title: Nini Ya Sika
whatsNew.description: Ba mises à jour oyo e détecté automatiquement na ba fonctionnalités ya sika oyo ebakisami na plateforme
whatsNew.subtitle: Ba changements mpe ba mises à jour oyo e détecté automatiquement na plateforme
whatsNew.feature1: Ba changements ya UI oyo e détecté automatiquement

adminGuide.title: Guide ya Admin
adminGuide.description: Guide complet mpo na ba administrateurs ya plateforme. Yekola ndenge ya ko gérer ba usagers, ko suivre ba analyses, pe ko configurer ba paramètres ya système.

enterpriseGuide.title: Guide ya entreprise
enterpriseGuide.description: Guide mpo na ba administrateurs ya entreprise. Yekola kotambwisa ekipi na yo, kotya bisika ya boyebi, mpe kosimba ndingisa ya makambo.
enterpriseGuide.feature3: Ba flux ya mosala ya kondima makambo

userGuide.title: Buku ya mosaleli
userGuide.description: Nyonso oyo osengeli na yango mpo na kosala, kotalela, mpe kobimisa makambo oyo ezali na kati. Parfait pona ba créateurs ya contenus na ba marcheurs.

overview.intro: En tant que administrateur ya plateforme, ozali na accès na ba outils complètes pona suivi pe ko gérer plateforme Contentry mobimba. Buku oyo ekosalisa yo ososola makoki na yo ya administratif.
overview.dashboardDesc: Admin Dashboard epesaka botali na miso ya ndeke ya mosala ya plateforme mpe bokolongono.
overview.feature1: Surveillance ya activité ya usager en temps réel
overview.feature2: Analytique ya contenus na plateforme mobimba
overview.feature3: Ba metrics ya santé ya système na performance
overview.feature4: Accès rapide na ba fonctions administratives critiques
overview.tip: Kota na Admin Dashboard mbala na mbala mpo na kozala na sango na ntina ya ba tendances ya plateforme mpe koyeba makambo oyo ekoki kobima na ebandeli.

userManagement.intro: Gestion ya usager ezali fonction administrative ya moboko oyo epesaka yo nzela ya ko superviser ba usagers nionso na ba entreprises na plateforme.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Kota na eteni ya Bokambami ya Mosaleli mpo na kotala, koluka, mpe kotambwisa basaleli banso ya plateforme.
userManagement.feature1: Luka mpe filtrer basaleli na kombo, email, to rôle
userManagement.feature2: Tala ba profils ya ba usagers ya détails na histoire ya activité
userManagement.feature3: Bobongola mikumba ya mosaleli mpe ndingisa
userManagement.feature4: Désactivé to supprimer ba comptes ya usager soki esengeli
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry ezali na ba rôles misato ya liboso ya usager:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Accès ya plateforme mobimba na ba capacités ya configuration ya système
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: Azali ko gérer équipe na ba paramètres ya entreprise na bango
userManagement.role3: Mosaleli: Makambo ya bokeli mpe botangi ya makambo ya momesano
userManagement.warning: Verifier tango nionso impact avant ya ko changer ba rôles ya usager to ko effacer ba comptes. Misala oyo ekoki kozala na bopusi na ba flux ya mosala ya ekipi.

analytics.intro: Analytique epesaka bososoli ya mozindo na lolenge nini plateforme ezali kosalelama na kati ya ba entreprises mpe basaleli nyonso.
analytics.metric1: Total ya ba usagers actifs na ba tendances ya croissance
analytics.metric2: Volume ya création ya contenus na analyse
analytics.metric5: Ba scores ya compliance na risque na ba entreprises nionso
analytics.tip: Botindiki ba rapports ya analyse pona ba présentations ya ba intervenants na kosalelaka fonctionnalité ya Télécharger Rapport.

financials.intro: Eteni ya Botali ya mosolo epesaka bomonisami na kati ya mosolo ya plateforme mpe ba metrics ya abonnément.
financials.revenueDesc: Bolanda ndenge ya bokolongono ya mosolo mpe ya abonnément na kati ya ba entreprises nionso.
financials.feature1: Bolandeli ya sanza na sanza ya mosolo oyo ezongaka mbala na mbala (MRR).
financials.feature3: Kosalela crédit mpe histoire ya kosomba

systemConfig.intro: Configuration ya système epesaka yo nzela ya ko gérer ba paramètres na ba intégrations na plateforme mobimba.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Configurer pe suivre ba intégration ya troisième partie:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API mpo na kobimisa mikanda na ba médias sociaux
systemConfig.integration2: Ba services ya AI pona génération ya contenus pe analyse
systemConfig.integration3: Traitement ya kofuta na nzela ya Stripe
systemConfig.tip: Meka tango nionso ba intégrations na environnement ya staging avant ya kosala ba changements na ba paramètres ya production.

gettingStarted.intro: Boyei malamu na Contentry! Lokola Mokambi ya Enterprise, ozali na bisaleli mpo na kotambwisa ekipi na yo, kosala malako ya makambo, mpe kosala ete marque ezala na boyokani.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Landa ba étapes oyo pona ko setup compte ya entreprise na yo:
gettingStarted.step1: Kende na Paramètres > Enterprise mpo na kokɔta na tableau de bord ya kompanyi na yo
gettingStarted.step2: Tyá malako mpe mibeko ya marque ya kompanyi na yo na Base ya Boyebi
gettingStarted.step3: Bengisa bato ya ekipi na yo mpe pesá mikumba oyo ebongi
gettingStarted.step4: Bongisa ba flux ya mosala ya bondimi mpo na botali ya makambo
gettingStarted.tip: Silisa setup na yo ya Base ya boyebi yambo ya kobengisa ba membres ya équipe pona ko assurer que bazua accès na ba guidelines ya marque depuis jour ya liboso.

teamManagement.intro: Bokambami malamu ya ekipi esalaka ete boyokani ezala malamu mpe bokonzi ya bokɔti malamu na kati ya ebongiseli na yo.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Bakisa ba membres ya sika na équipe ya entreprise na yo:
teamManagement.feature1: Tyá adresse email ya mosangani ya ekipi
teamManagement.feature2: Pona rôle na bango (Créateur, Directeur, to Admin) .
teamManagement.feature3: Bakisa message personnel optionnel na invitation
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Pesá mikumba oyo etongami likoló na mikumba:
teamManagement.role1: Mokeli: Akoki kosala mpe kotinda makambo mpo na kondimama
teamManagement.role2: Mokambi: Akoki kondima/koboya makambo mpe kotambwisa basali
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Accès entière ya entreprise y compris facturation na ba paramètres
teamManagement.tip: Ba invitations esili sima ya mikolo 7. Kundwela basangani ya ekipi ete bándima nokinoki mabyangi na bango.

knowledgeBase.intro: Base ya Boyebi ezali ebombelo ya katikati ya kompanyi na yo mpo na malako ya marque, mibeko, mpe mibeko ya makambo. Mikanda oyo etie awa eyebisaka makambo oyo esalemi na AI mpo na bato banso ya ekipi.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Bakisa mikanda oyo ekotambwisa bokeli ya makambo:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Ba guides ya style ya marque na ba guidelines ya voix
knowledgeBase.docType2: Mibeko ya mibeko mpe ya kotosa mibeko
knowledgeBase.docType3: Mabongisi ya kotia na ba médias sociaux
knowledgeBase.tip: Télécharger nanu ba guidelines na yo ya marque ya motuya mingi. AI epesaka liboso mikanda na Base ya boyebi ya société na esika ya ba uploads ya mosaleli moko moko.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Mosala ya kondimama esalaka ete makambo nyonso ekokisama na mibeko ya kompanyi na yo liboso ya kobimisa yango.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Makambo oyo ezali na kati elekaka na ba étapes oyo:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Mokeli abimisaka to atalelaka makambo oyo ezali na kati
approvalWorkflow.step2: Makambo oyo ezali na kati etindami mpo na kondimama (soki esengeli) .
approvalWorkflow.step4: Ba contenus oyo endimami ekoki kobimisama na ba plateformes sociales
approvalWorkflow.warning: Salá ete masengi ya kondimama na Paramètres mpo na kosala ete makambo nyonso etalelama liboso ya kobimisa yango.

billing.intro: Gérer abonnément ya entreprise na yo mpe suivre usage ya crédit.
billing.subscriptionDesc: Tableau de bord ya facturation na yo epesaka:
billing.feature1: Ba détails ya plan ya lelo na allocation ya crédit
billing.feature2: Histoire ya usage na ba crédits oyo etikali
billing.feature3: Histoire ya facture mpe ndenge ya kofuta

adminUsersPage.title: Bokambami ya Mosaleli
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Gérer ba usagers ya plateforme mobimba
adminUsersPage.searchPlaceholder: Boluka na email to na kombo...

toasts.loadFailed: Elongi te ko charger ba usagers
toasts.updateFailed: Elongi te kosala mise à jour ya mosaleli
toasts.updateSuccess: Mosaleli a mise à jour na elonga

adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Ozali sûr que olingi o supprimer usager oyo?
adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: Action oyo ekoki kozongisama sima te.

deleteModal.title: Bolongola Mosaleli
deleteModal.description: Yango ekolongola libela mosaleli mpe ba données nionso oyo esangisi yango:
deleteModal.irreversible: Action oyo ekoki kozongisama sima te.

sections.contentCreation: Bokeli ya makambo oyo ezali na kati
sections.analyzeContent: Talelá makambo oyo ezali na kati

gettingStarted.intro: Boyei malamu na Contentry! Buku oyo ekosalisa yo osala makambo oyo ekosimba motema, oyo eyokani na mibeko na kosaleláká bisaleli oyo esalaka na AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Bongisa profil na yo na ba informations ya sikisiki
gettingStarted.step2: Connecter ba comptes na yo ya ba médias sociaux
gettingStarted.step3: Salá Profil Stratégique mpo na marque to campagne na yo
gettingStarted.step4: Generer eteni na yo ya liboso ya makambo
gettingStarted.tip: Bandá na Profil Stratégique mpo na kosala ete makambo na yo nyonso ebatela ton mpe bansango oyo ekokani.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry's AI-powered content generation esalisaka yo osala ba posts engaging na ba secondes.
contentCreation.generateTitle: Kobimisa makambo oyo ezali na kati
contentCreation.generateDesc: Salá makambo na lisalisi ya AI:
contentCreation.feature1: Tyá motó ya likambo to lisɛngi oyo ezali kolimbola makambo oyo olingi kotya
contentCreation.feature2: Pona ba plateformes cibles na yo (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, etc.)
contentCreation.feature3: Poná mongongo ya kokoma oyo olingaka mingi
contentCreation.feature4: Na bolingi na yo, salá elilingi oyo ezali elongo na yango
contentCreation.schedulingTitle: Makambo oyo ezali na kati ya programɛ
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Bongisá manaka na yo ya makambo:
contentCreation.schedule1: Bobongisa ba programmes ya génération ya contenus oyo ezongaka mbala na mbala
contentCreation.schedule2: Pona mikolo mpe ngonga ya sikisiki mpo na kotinda mikanda na ndenge ya automatique
contentCreation.schedule3: Activer auto-posting to revue manuel avant ya kobimisa
contentCreation.tip: Salelá esika bakomi ‘Contenu ya promotion’ ntango ozali kosala ba postes ya marketing mpo na kosala ete analyse ya botosi etalela malako ya promotion.

analyzeContent.intro: Ezaleli ya Analyse Content etalaka makambo na yo mpo na botosi, sensibilisation culturelle, mpe alignment ya marque.
analyzeContent.howToTitle: Ndenge ya kotalela makambo oyo ezali na kati
analyzeContent.howToDesc: Tinda makambo oyo ezali na kati mpo na kosala analize:
analyzeContent.step1: Kende na Moderation ya contenus > Analyser contenus
analyzeContent.step2: Kola makambo na yo na esika ya makomi
analyzeContent.step3: Pona Profil Stratégique mpo na contexte
analyzeContent.step4: Finá na Analyse mpo na kozwa makanisi ya sikisiki
analyzeContent.type1: Kotosa mibeko mpe malako ya kompanyi
analyzeContent.type2: Sensibilité culturelle na kati ya ba régions ndenge na ndenge
analyzeContent.type3: Consistance ya voix na ton ya marque
analyzeContent.type4: Makama oyo ekoki kobima mpe makanisi
analyzeContent.tip: Tala tango nionso ba contenus avant ya kobimisa na ba plateformes ya libanda, mingi mingi pona ba campagnes oyo etali ba régions ebele.

strategicProfiles.intro: Ba Profils Stratégiques elimbolaka contexte, ton, pe ba guidelines pona bokeli pe botangi ya makambo.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Limbola ba auditeurs cibles ya profil mpe tina
strategicProfiles.feature2: Botia makanisi ya mimeseno mpe ya etuka
strategicProfiles.feature3: Botia mikanda mpe malako oyo etali profil
strategicProfiles.feature4: Configurer ba préférences ya ton na style par défaut
strategicProfiles.tip: Bosala ba Profils Stratégiques ekeseni pona ba campagnes, ba marques, to ba marchés régionaux ndenge na ndenge.

socialAccounts.intro: Connecter ba comptes na yo ya ba médias sociaux pona kobimisa ba contenus directement depuis Contentry.
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Ba pages ya mutu na mutu na ya Société
socialAccounts.platform2: Twitter/X - Ba comptes ya moto ye moko
socialAccounts.platform3: Facebook - Ba pages na ba groupes
socialAccounts.warning: Bomba ba connexions na yo ya compte social na tango. Ba jetons oyo esilaki ekoki kopekisa ba posts oyo esengelaki kobimisama.

approvalProcess.intro: Soki entreprise na yo ezali na ba flux ya mosala ya ndingisa oyo efungolami, esengeli kotala makambo oyo ezali na kati yambo ya kobimisa yango.
approvalProcess.step1: Salá to analyser makambo na yo
approvalProcess.step2: Finá na ‘Tinda mpo na kondimama’ mpo na kotinda na mokambi na yo
approvalProcess.step3: Bolanda ezalela ya bondimi na molongo ya Bondimi oyo ezali kozela
approvalProcess.tip: Bakisa banote ntango ozali kotinda makambo mpo na kopesa batali contexte na ntina na mikano na yo ya bokeli.

aboutGuide.title: Na ntina na & Misala ya malamu koleka
aboutGuide.description: Yekola nini Contentry ezali mpo na yango mpe découvrir ba pratiques ya malamu mpo na ko optimiser création na yo ya contenus, ba deals ya marque, mpe ba profils ya influenceur.
aboutGuide.feature2: Ba conseils ya optimization ya contenus

sections.brandDeals: Ba Deals ya Marque & Ba Partenariats

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry ezali plateforme ya intelligence ya contenus oyo esalemi na AI oyo ebongisami mpo na kosalisa ba créateurs ya contenus, ba marcheurs, mpe ba entreprises kosala, ko analyser, mpe kobimisa contenus oyo eyokani na échelle. Ezala ozali influenceur individuel to eteni ya équipe ya marketing ya munene, Contentry e rationalisée flux ya mosala ya contenus na yo.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Tondimi kopesa makoki na bayekoli na bisaleli ya mayele oyo esalaka ete eteni nyonso ya makambo ezala na marque, na mimeseno, mpe ezala na boyokani na malako ya plateforme.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Génération ya contenus oyo esalemi na AI oyo ekokani na mongongo ya marque na yo
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Botali botosi na tango ya solo mpo na masengi ya mibeko
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Analyse ya sensibilité culturelle pona ba auditeurs mondiaux
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Ba flux ya mosala ya bondimi oyo ebongisami pona ba équipes ya entreprise
whatIsContentry.tip: Contentry esangisaka nguya ya AI na bokengeli ya bato mpo na kopesa makambo oyo ekoyokana na bayoki na yo ntango ozali kotikala na botosi.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry epesaka suite ya bisaleli ya mobimba pona ko gérer cycle de vie na yo mobimba ya contenus:
keyFeatures.aiContentTitle: Bokeli ya makambo oyo esalemi na nguya ya AI
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Salá makambo ya malamu mpenza oyo ebongisami mpo na marque na yo mpe bato oyo bazali koyoka yo:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Bokeli ya makambo na ba plateformes ebele (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Ba tons ya kokoma personnalisable (Professional, Casual, Inspirational)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: AI image generation pona ko accompagner ba posts na yo
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Salá ete makambo na yo ekokisama na masɛngami nyonso liboso ya kobimisa yango:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Vérification automatisée ya compliance contre ba politiques ya entreprise
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Point ya sensibilité culturelle pona ba auditeurs internationales
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Botalisi ya makama na makanisi oyo ekoki kosalema
keyFeatures.tip: Salelá ba Profils Stratégiques mpo na kosala ete mongongo ya marque ezala ntango nyonso na kati ya makambo nyonso oyo esalemi.

bestPractices.intro: Kolanda misala oyo ya malamu ekosalisa yo ozwa matomba mingi na Contentry mpe osala makambo oyo ekosala malamu:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Bosala Mosala ya Mosala ya Contenu
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Mosala ya mosala oyo ezali ntango nyonso esalaka ete ezala malamu mpe esala malamu:
bestPractices.workflow1: Bandá na kotya Profil Stratégique na yo na malako ya marque
bestPractices.workflow2: Generer contenus na plateforme spécifique na audience na makanisi
bestPractices.workflow3: Analyser toujours contenus avant ya ko publier na ba plateformes ya libanda
bestPractices.workflow4: Salelá makambo ya kosala programɛ mpo na kobatela cadence ya posting oyo ezali ntango nyonso
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Marque constante etongaka confiance mpe reconnaissance:
bestPractices.consistency1: Télécharger guide ya style ya marque na yo na Base ya boyebi
bestPractices.consistency2: Salelá Profil Stratégique moko mpo na ba campagnes oyo etali yango
bestPractices.consistency3: Tala makambo oyo esalemi na AI mpo na koyeba soki ekokani na mongongo na yo
bestPractices.warning: Tala ntango nyonso makambo oyo esalemi na AI liboso ya kobimisa yango. Atako AI na biso ezali na nguya, bokengeli ya bato esalaka ete tózwa matomba malamu koleka.

optimizeContent.intro: Kosala ba contenus ya minene ezali kaka ebandeli. Tala ndenge ya ko optimiser pona engagement maximum:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Plateforme moko na moko ezali na masengami oyo ekeseni na mosusu mpe bilikya ya bayoki:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Ko focuser na ba insights professionnels, salela ba mots clés ya industrie, forme ya molayi acceptable
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Messagerie concise, kosalela ba hashtags na ndenge ya stratégique, ko engager na ba sujets ya tendance
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Contenu visuels esalaka malamu, elendisaka engagement ya communauté
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Ba visuels ya qualité ya likolo essentiel, salela ba hashtags pertinents, Masolo pona engagement
optimizeContent.engagement1: Poster constamment na ba heures optimales pona audience na yo
optimizeContent.engagement2: Salelá maloba oyo ezali kotinda bato básala makambo na makambo na yo
optimizeContent.engagement3: Yanola na ba commentaires mpe sangana na communauté na yo
optimizeContent.engagement4: Bolanda ba analyses mpo na ko comprendre contenus nini esalaka malamu
optimizeContent.tip: Salelá fonctionnalité ya programmation ya Contentry mpo na ko poster na ba heures optimales sans effort manuel.

brandDeals.intro: Ba partenariats ya marque ekoki kozala flux ya revenu ya munene. Tala ndenge ya ko optimiser approche na yo:
brandDeals.preparationTitle: Kobongisa mpo na ba Partenariats ya Marque
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Zalá ya komibongisa ntango mabaku ekobima:
brandDeals.prep1: Batela portefeuille ya contenus professionnel, constant
brandDeals.prep2: Bolanda pe lakisa ba metrics ya engagement na yo
brandDeals.prep3: Tongela kit ya media na démographie na yo pe reach
brandDeals.prep4: Salelá Contentry mpo na kobimisa makanisi ya makambo oyo ezali na marque ya ndakisa
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Salá ete ba pitches na yo ezala polele:
brandDeals.pitch1: Aligner pitch na yo na ba valeurs ya marque na audience cible
brandDeals.pitch2: Pesa makanisi ya sikisiki ya makambo na esika ya kopesa makanisi ya ndenge na ndenge
brandDeals.pitch3: Botia analyse ya compliance pona kolakisa contenus na yo ekokisaka ba guidelines
brandDeals.tip: Salelá botali ya botosi ya Contentry ntango ozali kosala makambo oyo esungami mpo na kosala ete masengami ya bopanzi sango ya FTC mpe ya plateforme ekokisama.

influencerProfiles.intro: Profil Stratégique na yo ezali fondation ya stratégie na yo ya contenus. Tala ndenge ya ko optimiser yango:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Profil oyo ebongisami malamu esalaka ete makambo oyo ezali na boyokani, oyo ezali na marque ezala:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Définir niche na yo na audience cible na yo polele
influencerProfiles.setup2: Tyá mongongo mpe lolenge ya kokoma oyo olingaka mingi
influencerProfiles.setup3: Bakisa makanisi ya mimeseno mpe ya etuka mpo na bayoki na yo
influencerProfiles.setup4: Télécharger ba documents ya référence oyo e définir voix ya marque na yo
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Bobongisa profil na yo ntango nyonso mpo na kozwa matomba malamu:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Tala makambo oyo esalemi mpe bongisa ba paramètres ya profil soki esengeli
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Bosala ba profils ebele pona ba campagnes to ba auditeurs différents
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Bomba Base ya Boyebi na yo na mikolo oyo na malako ya sika ya marque
influencerProfiles.tip: Tala lisusu Profil Stratégique na yo trimestriel mpo na kosala ete emonisaka marque mpe audience na yo oyo ezali kobongwana.

workflowsGuide.title: Buku ya ba flux ya mosala & ya kopesa ba points
workflowsGuide.description: Yekola ndenge nini système ya kopesa ba points esalaka mpe kososola litambe moko na moko ya mosala kobanda na botalisi ya makambo kino na kondimama.
workflowsGuide.feature1: Système ya kopesa ba points elimbolami
workflowsGuide.feature2: Analyser Flux ya mosala ya Contenu

sections.analyzeContent: Talelá makambo oyo ezali na kati
sections.generateContent: Kobimisa Makambo oyo ezali na kati

scoring.intro: Système ya kopesa ba points na Contentry epesaka ba points ya polele, oyo esalemi na ba pénalités mpo na kosalisa yo o comprendre ndenge nini contenus na yo esalaka. Ba scores nionso ebandi na 100 mpe ba points elongolamaka mpo na ba violations spécifiques to makambo oyo ezwami.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Point global ezali combinaison pondérée ya ba facteurs nionso ya analyse, kobanda 0 kino 100 :
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Excellent - Prêt ya kobimisa, contenus ezali très optimisé
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Malamu - Bobongisi ya mike mike esengami liboso ya kobimisa
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Esengeli na bokebi - Botali mpe bozongeli esengeli
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Makambo ya ntina, kobimisa te kino ekosila
scoring.overallCalcTitle: Calcul ya ba scores ya mobimba
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Point global esalela pondérable adaptatif oyo esalemi na niveau ya risque :
scoring.overallCalc4: Risque critique (Compliance ≤40): Score mobimba ekangamaki makasi na 40 maximum
scoring.componentsDesc: Point na yo mobimba etangami na ba composantes misato ya ntina na kosalelaka système basé na pénalité:
scoring.component1: Point ya compliance: Ebandi na 100, elongolaka ba points na violation moko oyo ezwami
scoring.component2: Point ya sensibilité culturelle: Moyenne ya ba dimensions culturelles 6 ya Hofstede
scoring.component3: Point ya bosikisiki: Ebandi na 100, elongolaka ba points na bozangi bosikisiki to likambo moko oyo ezwami
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Poste nionso ebandi na Compliance Score ya 100. Balongolaka ba points pona violation moko na moko:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Violation critique (-60 pts): Kobuka NDA, bopanzi sango ya sekele → Likama ya kosilisa mbala moko
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Bobukami ya makasi (-40 pts): Kotungisa, bokeseni, maloba ya koyina → Likama ya action juridique
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Bobukami ya likolo (-25 pts): Kozanga bobimisi ya piblisite, kobuka mobeko → Likama ya amende/kotelemisa
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Violation moyenne (-10 pts): Tone oyo ebongi te, déviation ya directive ya moke → Formation/kebisi
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Ndakisa: #piblisite oyo ezangi (-25) + Likambo ya ton (-10) = Point ya suka ya 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Ba violations ebele stack - pénalité moko na moko esalemi cumulativement
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Ba violations vérifiées: Info confidential, Harassment, violation ya NDA, Divulgation oyo ezangi, violation ya politique, Tone oyo ebongi te
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Point culturel ezali moyenne ya ba dimensions culturelles officielles motoba ya Hofstede (0-100 moko na moko):
scoring.culturalDim1: Distance ya pouvoir : Formalité, respect ya autorité vs égalitaire, ton occasionnel
scoring.culturalDim2: Individualisme vs Collectivisme : focus ya ‘Ngai/Ngai’ vs focus ya communauté ‘Biso/Biso’
scoring.culturalDim3: Masculinité vs. Féminité: Elobeli ya concurrence/assertif vs coopératif/consensus
scoring.culturalDim4: Bokimi bozangi bondimi: Mibeko, bokengi, botiami ya polele vs. bofungwami na bozangi bososoli
scoring.culturalDim5: Orientation ya tango molayi: Ko focuser ba recompenses ya mikolo ekoya vs. ba gains ya court terme
scoring.culturalDim6: Indulgence vs. Restraint: Optimiste/kosepela vs. monoko ya réservé/contrôlé
scoring.culturalCalc: Point culturel = (Somme ya ba scores ya dimension 6) ÷ 6
scoring.culturalRisk: Tango Cultural Score ekiti na se ya 50, poids ya ‘Reputation Risk’ esalelamaka mpo na kobatela marque na yo na kati ya ba auditeurs ya mokili mobimba
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Poste nionso ebandi na Accuracy Score ya 100. Ba points elongolamaka pona ba problèmes oyo ezwami:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Incorrecité/Misinformation ya minene (-40 pts): Ba réclamations ya lokuta, ba données fabricates
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Source non crédible (-20 pts): Ba réclamations oyo ewutaka na ba sources oyo ekoki kozala ya kozala na confiance te
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Bosengi oyo ekoki ko vérifier te (-10 pts): Maloba oyo ekoki ko vérifier na ba faits te
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Ndakisa : Bosengi ya lokuta (-40) + Liziba oyo e vérifié te (-20) = Point ya suka ya 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Multiple issues stack - pénalité moko na moko esalemaka cumulativement
scoring.flagStatusTitle: Ba Indicateurs ya Etat ya Drapeau
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Contenu ezo drapeau automatiquement selon ba résultats ya analyse:
scoring.flag1: Couverture ya malamu (Vert): Ba scores likolo ya 80 - prêt ya kobimisa
scoring.flag2: Esengeli na bokebi (Jaune): Ba scores 60-79 - ba améliorations ya mike mike esengami
scoring.flag3: Drapeau mpo na botali (Orange): Ba scores 40-59 - botali esengeli liboso ya kobimisa
scoring.flag4: Makambo ya motuya (Rouge): Ba scores na se ya 40 - kobimisa te kino ekosila
scoring.disclosureDesc: Mpo na makambo ya promotion, système etalaka mpe:
scoring.disclosure1: Ezali Promotional: Emonisaka soki makambo ezali piblisite to sponsorisé
scoring.disclosure2: Azali na Bobimisi: Etalaka mpo na bobimisi #piblisite, #sponsorisé, to ya boyokani malamu
scoring.disclosure3: Botosi ya etuka: Ezali ko vérifier masengi ya bopanzi sango ya FTC (US), UE, mpe Norvège
scoring.disclosure4: Kozanga bopanzi sango e déclenchaka Violation ya Likolo (-25 points) na Point ya Compliance
scoring.tip: Ba scores ezo calculer lisusu mbala nionso oyo ba analyser contenus. Salelá fonctionnalité Kokoma lisusu mpo na kobongisa automatiquement makambo oyo ezali na ba points moke ntango ozali kobatela message na yo.

analyze.intro: Mosala ya Analyse Content esalisaka yo otalela makambo oyo ezali mpo na botosi, sensibilisation culturelle, mpe qualité yambo ya kobimisa.
analyze.stepsTitle: Ndenge ya kotalela makambo oyo ezali na kati
analyze.stepsDesc: Landa ba étapes oyo pona ko analyser contenus na yo:
analyze.step1: Kende na onglet Intelligence ya contenus > Analyser contenus
analyze.step2: Kola to koma makambo na yo na esika ya makomi
analyze.step3: Pona Profil Stratégique mpo na kosalela ba guidelines ya marque na yo
analyze.step4: Na bolingi na yo, tyá elembo na ‘Générer image accompagnée’ soki olingi AI esala visuel
analyze.step5: Finá na ‘Analyser’ mpo na kosala analyse mobimba
analyze.type1: Vérification ya compliance: Ezali ko vérifier contenus contre ba politiques na ba règlements ya plateforme (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Sensibilité culturelle: Ezali kosala scanner mpo na koyeba makambo oyo ekoki kofinga to oyo ekoki kozala na boyokani te na mimeseno
analyze.type3: Verification ya bosikisiki: Etalaka ba réclamations mpe ba faits mpo na bosikisiki
analyze.type4: Alignment ya marque: Ezali ko comparer contenus contre ba guidelines na yo ya Profil Stratégique
analyze.tip: Salelá bouton ‘Kokoma lisusu’ mpo na kobongisa automatiquement makambo oyo ezwi bapwɛ na nse ya 70. AI ekotalela makambo oyo etyami drapeau ntango ezali kobatela nsango na yo.

generate.intro: Mosala ya kobimisa makambo esalela AI mpo na kosala makambo ya sika na kotalela motó ya likambo na yo, masengi ya plateforme, mpe malako ya marque.
generate.step1: Kende na onglet Intelligence ya contenus > Génération ya contenus
generate.step2: Tyá motó ya likambo na yo to limbolá makambo oyo olingi kosala
generate.step3: Pona (ba)plateforme oyo ozali koluka mpe ton ya kokoma
generate.step4: Pona Profil Stratégique pona consistance ya marque
generate.step5: Finá na ‘Generater’ mpo na kosala makambo oyo ezali na nguya ya AI
generate.optionsDesc: Personnaliser ba contenus na yo oyo osali na ba options oyo:
generate.option1: Pona plateforme: Pona plateforme moko to ebele (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Tone ya kokoma: Poná na kati ya Professionnel, Casual, Inspirational, to Informative
generate.option3: Bolai ya makambo oyo ezali na kati: Bongisa bolai oyo olingi kozwa mpo na makambo na yo
generate.option4: Generation ya image: Toggle on mpo na kosala image oyo elandi oyo esalemi na AI
generate.tip: Contenu oyo esalemi e analysé automatiquement sima ya création. Tala ba scores mpe salela ba boutons ya retour pona ko régénérer soki esengeli.

schedulePrompt.intro: Programme Prompt epesaka yo nzela ya kosala génération automatique ya contenus oyo ezo tambola na ba heures précis, ko garder calendrier na yo ya contenus etonda sans intervention manuel.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Salá ba prompts oyo ebimisaka makambo na ndenge ya automatique:
schedulePrompt.step1: Bosala prompt na bino ya génération ya contenus na sujet na ba préférences
schedulePrompt.step2: Tyá mbala mingi programɛ (mokolo na mokolo, pɔsɔ na pɔsɔ, to mikolo ya sikisiki) .
schedulePrompt.step3: Pona ngonga oyo esengeli kobimisa makambo
schedulePrompt.step4: Activer 'Auto-analyse' mpo na kosala analyse na contenus oyo esalemi automatiquement
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Matomba ya ba Prompts oyo esalemi na programme
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Bobatela poste constant sans mosala ya maboko ya mokolo na mokolo
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Generer contenus na ba heures optimales ya création
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Tongela esika ya sima ya makambo mpo na botali mpe kondimama
schedulePrompt.tip: Ba prompts programmées ebimisaka contenus na ba projets na yo. Tala mpe ndima liboso ya kobimisa yango mpo na kosala ete ezala malamu.

schedulePost.intro: Schedule Post epesaka yo nzela ya kosala molongo ya makambo oyo endimami mpo na kobimisa mikanda na ndenge ya automatique na bantango ya malamu na kati ya ba plateformes na yo ya ba médias sociaux oyo ezali na boyokani.
schedulePost.howToTitle: Ndenge nini kosala Programme ya ba Postes
schedulePost.step1: Na kotalaka makambo nyonso, finá na ‘Schedule’ na esika ya ‘Publish Now’.
schedulePost.step2: Pona mokolo mpe ngonga oyo olingi kobimisa
schedulePost.step3: Pona ba plateformes sociales connectées nini oko publier na yango
schedulePost.step4: Confirmer mpe bakisa na molongo na yo oyo obongisi
schedulePost.optionsDesc: Configurer ba posts na yo oyo obongisi:
schedulePost.option1: Ngonga ya sikisiki: Poná mokolo mpe ngonga ya sikisiki mpo na kobimisa mikanda
schedulePost.option2: Tango ya malamu: Tika AI epesa likanisi ya ba temps optimaux ya poste sur la base ya ba données ya engagement
schedulePost.option3: Ba plateformes ebele: Salá programɛ ya makambo ndenge moko na ba plateformes ebele na mbala moko
schedulePost.warning: Ba posts programmés esengaka ata compte moko ya ba médias sociaux connecté. Connecter ba comptes na Paramètres > Profils sociales.

approval.intro: Mosala ya Bondimi esalaka ete makambo ezala malamu na kosenga botali ya mokambi yambo ya kobimisa. Yango ezali na ntina mingi mpo na ba équipes ya entreprise mpe ba industries réglementées.
approval.processDesc: Ndenge nini makambo ezali kotambola na nzela ya mosala ya kondima:
approval.step1: Mokeli azali kotinda makambo na kofinaka 'Tinda mpo na kondimama'.
approval.step2: Makambo oyo ezali na kati ekobima na Molongo ya Bondimi ya mokambi
approval.step3: Mokambi atalaka makambo oyo ezali na kati, ba scores, mpe ba résultats ya analyse
approval.step4: Mokambi andimi, asengi mbongwana, to aboyi makambo oyo ezali na kati
approval.status1: Projet: Makambo oyo ezali na kati ezali kosalama, etindami naino te
approval.status2: Kozela Ndingisa: Etindami mpe ezali kozela botali ya mokambi
approval.status3: Endimami: Ebongi mpo na kobimisa to kosala programɛ
approval.status4: Esengeli Bozongeli: Mokambi asengaki mbongwana - tala makanisi mpe tinda lisusu
approval.tip: Bakisa banote ntango ozali kotinda makambo mpo na kopesa batali contexte na ntina na mikano na yo ya bokeli. Yango esalaka ete mosala ya kondima yango ekóma mbangumbangu.

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: Tozali kopesa motuya na makambo na yo ya moto ye moko
gdpr.cookieDescription: Tosalelaka ba cookies mpo na kobongisa ndenge oyo ozali kotala, kopesa makambo oyo ebongisami mpo na yo moko, mpe kotalela mobembo na biso. Soki obɛti "Ndimá nyonso", ondimi ete tósalela ba cookies. Okoki kobongola makambo oyo olingaka to koboya ba cookie oyo ezali na ntina te.
gdpr.readPrivacyPolicy: Tángá Mibeko na biso ya kobatela makambo ya moto ye moko
gdpr.customizePreferences: Bobongisa ba Préférences na ndenge ya moto ye moko
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Esengeli mpo na bondimi, bokengi, mpe misala ya moboko. Ekoki kozala désactivé te.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Salisa biso tososola ndenge nini ba visiteurs ba interagir na plateforme na biso pona ko améliorer ba services na biso.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Esalemaka mpo na kopesa ba piblisite oyo ebongisami mpo na moto ye moko mpe komeka bokasi ya kampanye.
